meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Death Sentence Commuted The Governor of Virginia spared the life of a Norfolk man whose long fight to overturn a 1979 death sentence has drawn national attention. Page A16. Tough Day for Police Critic A New York police sergeant was transferred for criticizing the city's new policing program. Then the transfer was rescinded. Page B1. Advantage, New York City Mayor Dinkins says a $150 million expansion plan will keep the United States Open tennis tournament in Flushing Meadows. Page D25.

Death Sentence Commuted The Governor of Virginia spared the life of a Norfolk man whose long fight to overturn a 1979 death sentence has drawn national attention. Page A16. Tough Day for Police Critic A New York police sergeant was transferred for criticizing the city's new policing program. Then the transfer was rescinded. Page B1. Advantage, New York City Mayor Dinkins says a $150 million expansion plan will keep the United States Open tennis tournament in Flushing Meadows. Page D25.
